hwSECSTATCommon.contactinfo: R&D BeiJing, Huawei Technologies co.,Ltd. Huawei Bld.,NO.3 Xinxi Rd., Shang-Di Information Industry Base, Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Zip:100085 Http://www.huawei.com E-mail:support@huawei.com
hwSECSTATCommon.description: V1.00 The HUAWEI-SECSTAT-MIB contains objects to manage the security statistics for router and firewall product.
hwSECSTATCommon.name: hwSECSTATCommon

hwSecStatAclDenyIcmpOcts.description: The total bytes of ICMP packets denied by acl rule.
hwSecStatAclDenyIcmpOcts.name: hwSecStatAclDenyIcmpOcts

hwSecStatAclDenyIcmpPkts.description: The total number of ICMP packets denied by acl rule.
hwSecStatAclDenyIcmpPkts.name: hwSecStatAclDenyIcmpPkts

hwSecStatAclDenyNonIcmpOcts.description: The total bytes of non ICMP packets denied for acl rule.
hwSecStatAclDenyNonIcmpOcts.name: hwSecStatAclDenyNonIcmpOcts

hwSecStatAclDenyNonIcmpPkts.description: The total number of non ICMP packets denied for acl rule.
hwSecStatAclDenyNonIcmpPkts.name: hwSecStatAclDenyNonIcmpPkts

hwSecStatAlgDropOcts.description: The total bytes of packets dropped by application layer gateway.
hwSecStatAlgDropOcts.name: hwSecStatAlgDropOcts

hwSecStatAlgDropPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped by application layer gateway.
hwSecStatAlgDropPkts.name: hwSecStatAlgDropPkts

hwSecStatAlteration.description: The proportion of change in the packets scale.
hwSecStatAlteration.name: hwSecStatAlteration

hwSecStatBlsDenyOcts.description: The total bytes of packets denied by blacklist.
hwSecStatBlsDenyOcts.name: hwSecStatBlsDenyOcts

hwSecStatBlsDenyPkts.description: The total number of packets denied by blacklist.
hwSecStatBlsDenyPkts.name: hwSecStatBlsDenyPkts

hwSecStatCalcTime.description: The period of packet scale statistics, the unit is minute.
hwSecStatCalcTime.name: hwSecStatCalcTime

hwSecStatClearGlobalAppInfo.description: Use this OID to clear the global application statistics information. When you want to clear the information, set this OID to 1.
hwSecStatClearGlobalAppInfo.name: hwSecStatClearGlobalAppInfo

hwSecStatClearGlobalDropInfo.description: Use this OID to clear the global dropped packets statistics information. When you want to clear the information, set this OID to 1.
hwSecStatClearGlobalDropInfo.name: hwSecStatClearGlobalDropInfo

hwSecStatClearGlobalSessFlowInfo.description: Use this OID to clear the global session flow statistics information. When you want to clear the information, set this OID to 1.
hwSecStatClearGlobalSessFlowInfo.name: hwSecStatClearGlobalSessFlowInfo

hwSecStatFragTblNum.description: The number of entry in fragment table.
hwSecStatFragTblNum.name: hwSecStatFragTblNum

hwSecStatGlobalSessSetDefault.description: This OID is used for setting the global session number configuration to default. When you want to set the value to default, set this OID to 1.
hwSecStatGlobalSessSetDefault.name: hwSecStatGlobalSessSetDefault

hwSecStatGlobalStatEnable.description: The status indicate whether enable the global statistics.
hwSecStatGlobalStatEnable.name: hwSecStatGlobalStatEnable

hwSecStatIPVerErrDropPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped for IP version error.
hwSecStatIPVerErrDropPkts.name: hwSecStatIPVerErrDropPkts

hwSecStatIcmpFloodDropOcts.description: The total bytes of packets dropped due to ICMP Flood attack.
hwSecStatIcmpFloodDropOcts.name: hwSecStatIcmpFloodDropOcts

hwSecStatIcmpFloodDropPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped due to ICMP Flood attack.
hwSecStatIcmpFloodDropPkts.name: hwSecStatIcmpFloodDropPkts

hwSecStatIcmpPktScale.description: The percent of ICMP packets. The hwSecStatTcpPktScale + hwSecStatUdpPktScale + hwSecStatIcmpPktScale must less than 100
hwSecStatIcmpPktScale.name: hwSecStatIcmpPktScale

hwSecStatIcmpSessNumMax.description: The maximun number of ICMP session allowed.
hwSecStatIcmpSessNumMax.name: hwSecStatIcmpSessNumMax

hwSecStatIcmpSessNumMin.description: The minimum of ICMP session. when the number of ICMP session in one system arrive the maximum allowed, system would decrease the ICMP session by some method, once the number of ICMP session in one system arrive the minumim, system would stop decreasing the ICMP session.
hwSecStatIcmpSessNumMin.name: hwSecStatIcmpSessNumMin

hwSecStatIpCrcDropPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped for CRC error.
hwSecStatIpCrcDropPkts.name: hwSecStatIpCrcDropPkts

hwSecStatIpTTLDropPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped for TTL error.
hwSecStatIpTTLDropPkts.name: hwSecStatIpTTLDropPkts

hwSecStatMonAllOcts.description: The number of received bytes by the device.
hwSecStatMonAllOcts.name: hwSecStatMonAllOcts

hwSecStatMonAllPkts.description: The number of received packets by the device.
hwSecStatMonAllPkts.name: hwSecStatMonAllPkts

hwSecStatMonCurSessSpeed.description: The current speed of session establishing.
hwSecStatMonCurSessSpeed.name: hwSecStatMonCurSessSpeed

hwSecStatMonFinPkts.description: The total number of FIN packets arriving the system.
hwSecStatMonFinPkts.name: hwSecStatMonFinPkts

hwSecStatMonFtpSessions.description: The total number of FTP sessions in the system currently.
hwSecStatMonFtpSessions.name: hwSecStatMonFtpSessions

hwSecStatMonH323Sessions.description: The total number of H323 sessions in the system currently.
hwSecStatMonH323Sessions.name: hwSecStatMonH323Sessions

hwSecStatMonHalfConn.description: The number of incomplete session in system currently.
hwSecStatMonHalfConn.name: hwSecStatMonHalfConn

hwSecStatMonHttpSessions.description: The total number of HTTP sessions in the system currently.
hwSecStatMonHttpSessions.name: hwSecStatMonHttpSessions

hwSecStatMonIcmpSess.description: The current number of ICMP sessions.
hwSecStatMonIcmpSess.name: hwSecStatMonIcmpSess

hwSecStatMonJavaAtckNum.description: The number of JAVA attack detected by system.
hwSecStatMonJavaAtckNum.name: hwSecStatMonJavaAtckNum

hwSecStatMonPassEtcOcts.description: The total bytes of other type packets pass the system.
hwSecStatMonPassEtcOcts.name: hwSecStatMonPassEtcOcts

hwSecStatMonPassEtcPkts.description: The total number of other type packets pass the system.
hwSecStatMonPassEtcPkts.name: hwSecStatMonPassEtcPkts

hwSecStatMonPassIcmpOcts.description: The total bytes of ICMP packets pass the system.
hwSecStatMonPassIcmpOcts.name: hwSecStatMonPassIcmpOcts

hwSecStatMonPassIcmpPkts.description: The total number of ICMP packets pass the system.
hwSecStatMonPassIcmpPkts.name: hwSecStatMonPassIcmpPkts

hwSecStatMonPassTcpOcts.description: The total bytes of TCP packets pass the system.
hwSecStatMonPassTcpOcts.name: hwSecStatMonPassTcpOcts

hwSecStatMonPassTcpPkts.description: The total number of TCP packets pass the system.
hwSecStatMonPassTcpPkts.name: hwSecStatMonPassTcpPkts

hwSecStatMonPassUdpOcts.description: The total bytes of UDP packets pass the system.
hwSecStatMonPassUdpOcts.name: hwSecStatMonPassUdpOcts

hwSecStatMonPassUdpPkts.description: The total number of UDP packets pass the system.
hwSecStatMonPassUdpPkts.name: hwSecStatMonPassUdpPkts

hwSecStatMonPeakSessSpeed.description: The maximun speed of session establishing since device startup.
hwSecStatMonPeakSessSpeed.name: hwSecStatMonPeakSessSpeed

hwSecStatMonRcvEtcOcts.description: The total bytes of other type packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvEtcOcts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvEtcOcts

hwSecStatMonRcvEtcPkts.description: The total number of other type packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvEtcPkts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvEtcPkts

hwSecStatMonRcvFragOcts.description: The total bytes of fragment packets arriving the system.
hwSecStatMonRcvFragOcts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvFragOcts

hwSecStatMonRcvFragPkts.description: The total number of fragment packets arriving the system.
hwSecStatMonRcvFragPkts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvFragPkts

hwSecStatMonRcvFtpOcts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvFtpOcts

hwSecStatMonRcvFtpPkts.description: The total number of FTP packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvFtpPkts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvFtpPkts

hwSecStatMonRcvH323Octs.description: The total bytes of H323 packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvH323Octs.name: hwSecStatMonRcvH323Octs

hwSecStatMonRcvH323Pkts.description: The total number of H323 packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvH323Pkts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvH323Pkts

hwSecStatMonRcvHttpPkts.description: The total number of HTTP packets received by system.

hwSecStatMonRcvIcmpOcts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvIcmpOcts

hwSecStatMonRcvIcmpPkts.description: The total number of ICMP packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvIcmpPkts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvIcmpPkts

hwSecStatMonRcvRtspOcts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvRtspOcts

hwSecStatMonRcvRtspPkts.description: The total number of RTSP packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvRtspPkts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvRtspPkts

hwSecStatMonRcvTcpOcts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvTcpOcts

hwSecStatMonRcvTcpPkts.description: The total number of TCP packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvTcpPkts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvTcpPkts

hwSecStatMonRcvUdpOcts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvUdpOcts

hwSecStatMonRcvUdpPkts.description: The total number of UDP packets received by system.
hwSecStatMonRcvUdpPkts.name: hwSecStatMonRcvUdpPkts

hwSecStatMonRstPkts.description: The total number of RESET packets arriving the system.
hwSecStatMonRstPkts.name: hwSecStatMonRstPkts

hwSecStatMonRtspSessions.description: The total number of RTSP sessions in the system currently.
hwSecStatMonRtspSessions.name: hwSecStatMonRtspSessions

hwSecStatMonSmtpSessions.description: The total number of SMTP sessions in the system currently.
hwSecStatMonSmtpSessions.name: hwSecStatMonSmtpSessions

hwSecStatMonSvrMapTblNum.description: The total number of server map.
hwSecStatMonSvrMapTblNum.name: hwSecStatMonSvrMapTblNum

hwSecStatMonSynAckPkts.description: The total number of SYN-ACK packets arriving the system.
hwSecStatMonSynAckPkts.name: hwSecStatMonSynAckPkts

hwSecStatMonSynPkts.description: The total number of SYN packets arriving the system.
hwSecStatMonSynPkts.name: hwSecStatMonSynPkts

hwSecStatMonTcpSess.description: The current number of TCP sessions.
hwSecStatMonTcpSess.name: hwSecStatMonTcpSess

hwSecStatMonTotalBootConnNum.description: The total number of connection since device startup. This number is increased only.
hwSecStatMonTotalBootConnNum.name: hwSecStatMonTotalBootConnNum

hwSecStatMonTotalSess.description: The total session in the system currently.
hwSecStatMonTotalSess.name: hwSecStatMonTotalSess

hwSecStatMonUdpSess.description: The current number of UDP sessions.
hwSecStatMonUdpSess.name: hwSecStatMonUdpSess

hwSecStatNoSessTblOcts.description: The total bytes of packets dropped for no session.
hwSecStatNoSessTblOcts.name: hwSecStatNoSessTblOcts

hwSecStatNoSessTblPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped for no session.
hwSecStatNoSessTblPkts.name: hwSecStatNoSessTblPkts

hwSecStatPktScaleSetDefault.description: This OID is used for setting the packet scale configuration to default. When you want to set the value to default, set this OID to 1.
hwSecStatPktScaleSetDefault.name: hwSecStatPktScaleSetDefault

hwSecStatProtoErrDropPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped for protocol error.
hwSecStatProtoErrDropPkts.name: hwSecStatProtoErrDropPkts

hwSecStatSeqErrOcts.description: The total bytes of packets dropped for sequence number error.
hwSecStatSeqErrOcts.name: hwSecStatSeqErrOcts

hwSecStatSeqErrPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped for sequence number error.
hwSecStatSeqErrPkts.name: hwSecStatSeqErrPkts

hwSecStatTcpPktScale.description: The percent of TCP packets. The hwSecStatTcpPktScale + hwSecStatUdpPktScale + hwSecStatIcmpPktScale must less than 100
hwSecStatTcpPktScale.name: hwSecStatTcpPktScale

hwSecStatTcpProxySessNumMax.description: The maximun number of TcpProxy session allowed.
hwSecStatTcpProxySessNumMax.name: hwSecStatTcpProxySessNumMax

hwSecStatTcpProxySessNumMin.description: The minimum of TcpProxy session. when the number of TcpProxy session in one system arrive the maximum allowed, system would decrease the TcpProxy session by some method, once the number of TcpProxy session in one system arrive the minumim, system would stop decreasing the TcpProxy session.
hwSecStatTcpProxySessNumMin.name: hwSecStatTcpProxySessNumMin

hwSecStatTcpSessNumMax.description: The maximun number of TCP session allowed.
hwSecStatTcpSessNumMax.name: hwSecStatTcpSessNumMax

hwSecStatTcpSessNumMin.description: The minimum of TCP session. when the number of TCP session in one system arrive the maximum allowed, system would decrease the TCP session by some method, once the number of tcp session in one system arrive the minumim, system would stop decreasing the TCP session.
hwSecStatTcpSessNumMin.name: hwSecStatTcpSessNumMin

hwSecStatUdpFloodDropOcts.description: The total bytes of packets dropped due to UDP Flood attack.
hwSecStatUdpFloodDropOcts.name: hwSecStatUdpFloodDropOcts

hwSecStatUdpFloodDropPkts.description: The total number of packets dropped due to UDP Flood attack.
hwSecStatUdpFloodDropPkts.name: hwSecStatUdpFloodDropPkts

hwSecStatUdpPktScale.description: The percent of UDP packets. The hwSecStatTcpPktScale + hwSecStatUdpPktScale + hwSecStatIcmpPktScale must less than 100
hwSecStatUdpPktScale.name: hwSecStatUdpPktScale

hwSecStatUdpSessNumMax.description: The maximun number of UDP session allowed.
hwSecStatUdpSessNumMax.name: hwSecStatUdpSessNumMax

hwSecStatUdpSessNumMin.description: The minimum of UDP session. when the number of UDP session in one system arrive the maximum allowed, system would decrease the UDP session by some method, once the number of tcp session in one system arrive the minumim, system would stop decreasing the UDP session.
hwSecStatUdpSessNumMin.name: hwSecStatUdpSessNumMin
